auth.headline: Steam Account
auth.logInToContribute: Verify your Steam account to contribute content
auth.note: Within your [Steam Privacy Settings]({{link}}), 'My profile' must be set to public. 'Game Details' is not required to be public, but if it is, ownership and playtime information will be sent with your contributions.
auth.steamIdIntro: Alternatively to signing in with Steam, you may provide [an identifier]({{steamIdLink}}) for an account so that you can [explore its library or wishlist]({{link}}).
auth.steamLoginIntro: ProtonDB requires Steam authentication to confirm the identity of contributors. Signing in this way accesses some public information about you but it will NOT bestow any privileges to your Steam account.

contextualInfo.recentlyImproved: {{context}} reports with latest two Proton versions

footer.data: This site uses data from {{name}} as well as data
footer.description: {{name}} is a passion project from [@bdefore]({{link}}) and a dedicated community of reporters.
footer.feedbackPrompt: Have some feedback? Come chat with us!
footer.legal: This site has no affiliation with Valve Software. All game images and logos are property of their respective owners.

libraryLoader.errorLoadingGames: Error loading games. Please ensure both Profile and Game Details are public on this account!
libraryLoader.headline: Library
libraryLoader.note: You do not need to sign in with Steam to load your library, but if you do your library will be found automatically. Your [Steam Privacy Settings]({{link}}) for 'My Profile' and 'Game Details' must be public.

preferences.headline: Preferences
preferences.intro: ProtonDB displays the submitter's Steam nickname beside reports. Your unique Steam ID is not transmitted in the data of published report data. If you are concerned your nickname may be used to infer your Steam profile, you can choose a different nickname here and this will be used after the next content refresh.
preferences.note: Your preferences will synchronize wherever you login with Steam.

performanceMode.prompt: Would you prefer to run a performance-friendly version of the site?

preferredDeviceType.prompt: What device type should be prioritized when displaying content, if any?

profile.exploreLibrary: Now that you've got your library loaded, you can explore it sorted with the following views:

libraryTags.headline: The following tags are common across your library. You can dive in with these:
libraryTags.lackReportsByHoursPlayed: Lack Reports by your hours played
libraryTags.lackReportsBySteamDbScore: Lack Reports by SteamDB user score

reports.addAReportPrompt: Let us all know how it runs by [contributing a report]({{link}})!
reports.doYouOwnSteamDeck: Do you own one? You can [add a device]({{link}}) on your profile.
reports.filteredOutHeadline: {{count}} reports do not match your filtering criteria for {{filters}}
reports.noReportsYetSteamDeck: No reports yet on Steam Deck.
reports.readyToAuthorSteamDeck: You're ready to author Steam Deck reports.
reports.superceded: There is a newer report of this type from this author
reports.timePlayedOnLinux: You've played on Linux for {{hours}} hours.
reports.zeroStateMessageWithFilters: No reports match your applied filters
